title: Kendall Jenner looks effortlessly stylish in charcoal grey jacket and matching trousers
text:
She's one of the fashion industry's most in-demand models and has worked with some of the world's top designers.

And Kendall Jenner showed off her sense of style as she went for a bite to eat at Emilio's Trattoria Italian restaurant in Los Angeles this week.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star, 23, donned a charcoal grey jacket with a pair of matching trousers with a wide leg.

Out and about: Kendall Jenner, 23, showed off her sense of style as she went for a bite to eat at Emilio's Trattoria Italian restaurant in Los Angeles this week

Adding height to her frame with a pair of black boots, Kendall also sported a white top for her outing.

Letting her brunette locks fall loose down her shoulders, the reality star completed her look for the day with a pair of shades.

Having appeared alongside her family on Keeping Up With The Kardashians since she was a child, Kendall began modelling at age 14 when she was signed by Wilhelmina Models in New York.

Her outing comes after Kendall got cosy with her ex-bau A$AP Rocky during the new Calvin Klein advert.

Style: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star donned a charcoal grey jacket with a pair of matching trousers with a wide leg

The model showcased her sensational physique as she stripped down to a set of matching Calvin Klein underwear for the 50th anniversary promotion.

Kendall and A$AP Rocky were last linked in August earlier this year, when he was spotted attending Kanye's Sunday service after being released from Swedish jail.

The former couple dated on and off beginning in 2016, with rumors of a hookup after they attended one of Jenner's events in February, according to Us Weekly.

Fashion: Adding height to her frame with a pair of black boots, Kendall also sported a white top for her outing

Looking good: Letting her brunette locks fall loose down her shoulders, the reality star completed her look for the day with a pair of shades

Career: Having appeared alongside her family on Keeping Up With The Kardashians since she was a child, Kendall began modelling at age 14

They were also photographed together on a number of other occasions over the next year or so, which included sister Kylie Jenner's 19th birthday in 2016.

But eventually they called it quits on their relationship by the end of the summer the following year.

A$AP was arrested July 2 in Stockholm after an alleged street altercation involving a 19-year-old man named Mustafa Jafari and a friend.

In demand: She has modelled for the likes of Vogue, Victoria's Secret and Estée Lauder

A number of high-profile celebrities posted messages of support on social media that included Justin Bieber and Shawn Mendes.

But it was Kanye West who had an integral part in helping persuade President Donald Trump to jump in and push for A$AP's release.

He was eventually set free on Friday, pending the judges ruling in the case, which is set for August 14.

NBC reported that the US government warned Sweden of 'negative consequence' to the relationship between the two countries if the case wasn't resolved as soon as possible.
description: The model, 23, looked nothing short of sensational at Emilio's Trattoria Italian restaurant in Los Angeles this week.
